value:
So your weapon is like a bow, right?
You can fire at things far away? We
should practice together sometime!

I'm kind of a baby face and, well,
a little childish. I need to work on
being more knightly, you know?

I feel like I really do my best with
you calling the shots. Thanks for
that, $Nu.

I'd love to give a big, inspiring
speech to everyone someday...but
I'm not good at that kind of thing.

My archery mentor is a man named
Jeorge. He's not just the best shot
I know—he's the best person.

Hello! Are you
$Nu?$k$pI've come to bring a hello from
$Nf!

I had no idea I could improve
so much!
Good—one step at a time.
I'll always be a green recruit...

I can hardly wait to see how well
I can shoot now!

I'm Gordin—an archer in the service
of the Altean knights. And happy to
be of help to you too!

Thanks so much for all your
encouragement. I was only able to
work this hard because of you.$k$pWith your leadership, I was able to
help out lots of times, and that
makes me real happy.$k$pI just wish I looked as grown-up as
I feel! Hahaha—I guess that's asking
too much.$k$pI do feel like I'll continue to grow as
long as I'm with you, though.
Thanks.
えいっ！
やぁっ！
うああっ！
Drat...
I can do this!
Bull's-eye!
Come on... Come ON!
I keep getting better!
I can't...
Haha
Oh, hey. Did you need me?
*chuckles* You checking up on everyone or just me?
I don't really look the part of an Altean knight, do I?
Let's train and improve together. Sound good?
If you had to guess, how old would you say I look?
I know, I know... I look young for my age.
Hey, I'm counting on you. Just thought you should know.
All right!
What now?
You got it!
